name: RUBY
desc: It is a server side object oriented programming language. It is used for web development.

name: HTML
desc: Stands for Hypertext Markup Language. It is the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications.

name: CSS
desc: Stands for Cascading Style Sheets. It is used to style web pages.

name: JAVASCRIPT
desc: JavaScript is a high-level, dynamic, untyped, and interpreted programming language. It has been standardized in the ECMAScript language specification. Alongside HTML and CSS, JavaScript is one of the three core technologies of World Wide Web content production.

name: JQUERY
desc: It is javascript library. JQuery's syntax is designed to make it easier to navigate a document, select DOM elements, create animations, handle events, and develop Ajax applications.

name: AJAX
desc: It is a concept used in web development to send or recieve data without the need to reload the web page.
